thread.title: NFl streams Giants-Bills game from London

title: NFl streams Giants-Bills game from London
text:
NFl streams Giants-Bills game from London For the first time today, the NFL will experiment with streaming a game from London. Post to Facebook NFl streams Giants-Bills game from London For the first time today, the NFL will experiment with streaming a game from London. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs NFl streams Giants-Bills game from London 10 News Staff, WTSP 8:37 a.m. EDT October 25, 2015 The matchup at 9:30 a.m. between the Buffalo Bills and Jacksonville Jaguars will be available only through Yahoo outside of the teams' home cities. (Photo: USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
For the first time Sunday, the NFL will experiment with streaming a game from London. 
The matchup at 9:30 a.m. between the Buffalo Bills and Jacksonville Jaguars will be available only through Yahoo outside of the teams' home cities. 
Yahoo and other tech companies could be future partners in how the league broadcasts the sport. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1N0DErZ TOP VIDEOS
